summary: Five years after the OAV series, Third series robot Naomi Armitage and her husband Ross Sylibus now live peacefully on Mars with their daughter, until a corporation wants to know the secrets of the third's ability to bear children.
cast: Ryôka Yuzuki|Hikaru Hanada|Yuka Imai|Kazuhiro Yamaji|Daiki Nakamura|Jôji Nakata|Mitsuki Saiga|Takumi Yamazaki|Hiroaki Ishikawa|Iemasa Kayumi|Katsuhisa Hôki|Kenta Miyake|Masako Jô|Masaru Hachinohe|Yukio Hada|Juliette Lewis|Kirk Baily|Catherine Battistone|Ahmed Best|Peter Doyle|Dorothy Elias-Fahn|Don Fischer|Michael Forest|Rebecca Forstadt|Josh Gerhardt|Barbara Goodson|Michael Gregory|Rachael Harris|Leslie Hicks|Milton James|Wendee Lee|Mona Marshall|Michael McCarty|Michael McConnohie|Tony Oliver|Bob Papenbrook|Tony Pope|Lisa Rhoden|Michelle Ruff|Lia Sargent|Melodee Spevack|Carol Stanzione|Skip Stellrecht|Kirk Thornton|Dave Wittenberg|Tom Wyner
title: Armitage: Dual Matrix
